modName: Thieves Guild - Guildmasters Quarters by Crass
summary: This adds a moderate-sized room for the Guildmaster of the Thieves Guild into The Ragged Flagon - Cistern
descriptionHtml:
[color=FF0000] Description: [/color]

This adds a moderate-sized room for the Guildmaster of the Thieves Guild into The Ragged Flagon - Cistern

The room is located in the tunnel towards the training room.

The door requires a key that is found in Mercer Frey\'s house (Riftweald) (Near the plans for one of the quests, in the basement)


[color=FF0000] Installation: [/color]

Extract the .esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.



[color=FF0000] Updates: [/color]

[color=green] V1.1: [/color]

Added more items / changed lighting 

[color=green] V1.2: [/color]

More realistic lighting / change screenshots
author: Dimebag1096
